name: Solar Pilgrim
description:
Solar Pilgrim is a top-down wave survival game developed by a single person. 

In Solar Pilgrim you'll mow down hundreds of enemies to unlock new items and guns. With the right combination of items, you'll be nigh-untouchable and able to destroy waves in seconds.

Features :
  • Hundreds of waves to clear
  • Tons of items and guns to collect
  • 30+ arenas to fight in
  • Enemies unique to their environments
  • A robust end-game
If you encounter any issues or bugs please report them in the comments.
